sentences.en: For to be illegals would create what in Europe is called a “helot” population, helots in ancient Greece having had an ill-defined intermediate status between slaves and free citizens.
sentences.cn: ——译者注】”的人群。 在古希腊，希洛特的地位界定模糊，介于奴隶和自由民之间的中间地位。

words.tran_cn: 受人轻视之人；（古希腊斯巴达的）奴隶

trans.tran_cn: 农奴（大写时尤指古斯巴达的农奴）
trans.tran_en: (in ancient Greece, esp Sparta) a member of the class of unfree men above slaves owned by the state
